ARSEN VENGER BEZ DLAKE NA JEZIKU: Zbog ovoga je Aron Remzi napustio Arsenal i prešao u Juventus!
07 Nov 2019, 14:43 by Marko
Aron Remzi je prethodnog leta odlučio da ne produži ugovor sa Arsenalom, te je potpisao za Juventus bez obeštećenja.
Reprezentativac Velsa i nekadašnji kapiten „tobdžija“ je tako nakon 11 godina otkako je potpisao za Arsenal odlučio da napusti klub u kome je stasao kao igrač.
Arsen Venger ga je još sada već davne 2008. godine kupio od Kardifa za 6,4 miliona evra, a nekadašnji menadžer „tobdžija“ otkrio je u intervjuu Bein Sportu razloge zbog kojih je Velšanin promenio sredinu.
– Aron je hteo da ostane u Arsenalu. Imao je dogovor sa klubom oko produžetka saradnje. Dugo sam pokušavao da ga nagovorim da potpiše novi ugovor, međutim ponekad agenti igrača određuju gde će njihovi klijenti nastaviti karijeru. Da je bilo samo do njega, on bi ostao u Londonu, otkrio je legendarni francuski stručnjak.
Remzi je za sada odigrao osam mečeva za Juventus i postigao dva gola, a dres Arsenala nosio je na 369 utakmica, uz 64 postignuta gola i 65 upisanih asistencija.

ARSEN VENGER WITHOUT LANGUAGE HAIR: Because of this, Aaron Remzi left Arsenal to move to Juventus!
07 Nov 2019, 14:43 by Marko
Aaron Remzi decided last summer not to extend his contract with Arsenal and signed for Juventus without compensation.
So, after 11 years since signing for Arsenal, the Wales national team and former captain of the Tubby has decided to leave the club where he grew up as a player.
Arsen Wenger already bought it from Cardiff back in 2008 for € 6.4 million, and the former manager of "Tobdzia" revealed in an interview with Bein Sport the reasons why Welshman changed the middle.
- Aaron wanted to stay at Arsenal. He had an agreement with the club to extend the cooperation. For a long time, I tried to get him to sign a new contract, but sometimes player agents determine where their clients will pursue careers. If it were only for him, he would have stayed in London, the legendary French expert revealed.
Ramsey has played eight matches for Juventus so far and has scored two goals and has worn the Arsenal jersey in 369 games, with 64 goals scored and 65 assists recorded.
